bill_title: Honoring the 2022-2023 Canton C-Hawk girls wrestling team for its outstanding accomplishments.

bill_versions.bill_text: A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Honoring the 2022-2023 Canton C-Hawk girls wrestling team for its outstanding accomplishments. WHEREAS, the Canton C-Hawk girls wrestling team, led by head coach Jeremy Ask, finished second in the 2023 South Dakota High School Activities Association girls state tournament held in Rapid City; and WHEREAS, the C-Hawks compiled an impressive 134.5 points during the state tournament; and WHEREAS, Sara Schroder (113 lbs.), Carlee Laubach (170 lbs.), and Zoe Adam (190 lbs.) won individual state titles for the C-Hawks: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Ninety-Eighth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that the 2022-2023 Canton C-Hawk girls wrestling team be honored for its outstanding accomplishments.

A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Honoring the 2022-2023 Canton C-Hawk girls wrestling team for its outstanding accomplishments. WHEREAS, the Canton C-Hawk girls wrestling team, led by head coach Jeremy Ask, finished second in the 2023 South Dakota High School Activities Association girls state tournament held in Rapid City; and WHEREAS, the C-Hawks compiled an impressive 134.5 points during the state tournament; and WHEREAS, Sara Schroder (113 lbs.), Carlee Laubach (170 lbs.), and Zoe Adam (190 lbs.) won individual state titles for the C-Hawks: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Ninety-Eighth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that the 2022-2023 Canton C-Hawk girls wrestling team be honored for its outstanding accomplishments.
